metadata.description: FMEX (Football Metaverse Experience) is a multi-collection of football clubs and players made into a singular Web3 universe. This Football Metaverse GameFi will not only reward users with extensive play-to-earn and 100% payback mechanics, but also a chance to win exclusive football merchandise, tickets to major matches, in-game drops and more. Explore FMEX's first collection with Borussia Dortmund.
metadata.name: BVB Football Metaverse Collection #1
